messages.title: Rebecca Blinkhorn
messages.content: Dear neighbour, ... I'm writing for you because I want everyone to know what John did for us. ... Please, vote for John Leech this Thursday, Rebecca.

issues.health: It took a venomous bug and an admission to hospital before a decision was made, against my wishes, that all we could do was tube feed him. Very few people believed in me or the treatment I wanted. ... John took control and fought to get this treatment for my son.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm writing for you because I want everyone to know what John did for us.

images.caption: Manchester Evening News Mum of the Year 2014 @tubetochicken

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published & Promoted by Liam Worthington on behalf of John Leech both at 8 Gawsworth Avenue, M20 5NF. Printed by Callprint 109 Portland Street, Manchester, M1 6DN. MCRLIB_DEM.
